data.name: animate.css
data.description: Just-add-water CSS animation, animate.css is a bunch of cool, fun, and cross-browser animations for you to use in your projects. Great for emphasis, home pages, sliders, and general just-add-water-awesomeness.

data.name: Autosize
data.description: Small jQuery plugin to allow dynamic resizing of textarea height, so that it grows as based on visitor input.

data.name: BlockUI
data.description: The jQuery BlockUI Plugin lets you simulate synchronous behavior when using AJAX, without locking the browser.

data.name: Bootbox
data.description: Bootbox.js is a small JavaScript library which allows you to create programmatic dialog boxes using Bootstrap modals, without having to worry about creating, managing or removing any of the required DOM elements or JS event handlers.

data.name: Bootstrap
data.description: Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JS framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

data.name: Bootstrap calendar
data.description: Full view calendar with year, month, week and day views based on templates with Twitter Bootstrap.

data.name: Bootstrap datepicker
data.description: Add datepicker picker to field or to any other element.

data.name: Bootstrap datetimepicker
data.description: As 'bootstrap-datepicker' is restricted to the date scope (day, month, year), this project aims to support too the time picking (hour, minutes).

data.name: Bootstrap maxlength
data.description: This plugin integrates by default with Twitter bootstrap using badges to display the maximum length of the field where the user is inserting text. This plugin uses the HTML5 attribute 'maxlength' to work.

data.name: Bootstrap session timeout
data.description: Session timeout and keep-alive control with a nice Bootstrap warning dialog.

data.name: Bootstrap switch
data.description: Turn checkboxes and radio buttons in toggle switches.

data.name: Bootstrap taginput
data.description: jQuery plugin providing a Twitter Bootstrap user interface for managing tags.

data.name: Bootstrap wizard
data.description: This twitter bootstrap plugin builds a wizard out of a formatter tabbable structure. It allows to build a wizard functionality using buttons to go through the different wizard steps and using events allows to hook into each step individually.

data.name: Bootstrap wysihtml5
data.description: bootstrap-wysihtml5 is a javascript plugin that makes it easy to create simple, beautiful wysiwyg editors with the help of wysihtml5 and Twitter Bootstrap.

data.name: Chart | C3js
data.description: C3 enables deeper integration of charts into your application.

data.name: Chart | Chartjs
data.description: Simple, clean and engaging charts for designers and developers.

data.name: Chart | Flot
data.description: Attractive JavaScript plotting for jQuery, Flot is a pure JavaScript plotting library for jQuery, with a focus on simple usage, attractive looks and interactive features. Works with Internet Explorer 6+, Chrome, Firefox 2+, Safari 3+ and Opera 9.5+.

data.name: Chart | Morris
data.description: Good-looking charts shouldn't be difficult.

data.name: Chosen
data.description: Chosen is a jQuery plugin that makes long, unwieldy select boxes much more user-friendly.

data.name: Counter Up
data.description: Counter-Up is a lightweight jQuery plugin that counts up to a targeted number when the number becomes visible.

data.name: cube portfolio
data.description: Cube Portfolio is a jQuery plugin that provide animated filtering, grid and slider system, built-in lightbox and is fully responsive for any ordored content.

data.name: Datatables
data.description: Datatables is hands down the best jQuery table plugin. I have enjoyed using it over the years and highly recommend it to all. Recently, I have tried to use Datatables in an responsive web project.

data.name: Dropzone
data.description: DropzoneJS is an open source library that provides drag'n'drop file uploads with image previews.

data.name: Fuelux
data.description: Extends Twitter Bootstrap with additional lightweight JavaScript controls. Easy to install, customize, update, and optimize. All functionality covered by live documentation and unit tests.

data.name: Gritter notification
data.description: The super awesome background is just to show you that all notifications are transparent! Tested in: FF 3+, Opera 9, IE7, IE8, Safari 4+.

data.name: Holder.js
data.description: Holder renders image placeholders entirely in browser. Placeholders can have custom colors, fonts, resizing behavior, and rendering engine (Canvas/SVG).

data.name: HTML5Shiv
data.description: This script is the defacto way to enable use of HTML5 sectioning elements in legacy Internet Explorer.

data.name: Icon | Font Awesome
data.description: Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized — size, color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done with the power of CSS.

data.name: Icon | Map Icons
data.description: An icon font for use with Google Maps API and Google Places API using SVG markers and icon labels.

data.name: Icon | Simple line icon
data.description: Simple line icons with CSS, SAAS, LESS & Web-fonts files.

data.name: Icon | Weather
data.description: Weather Icons is a font of 123 weather themed icons, ready to be dropped right into Bootstrap or any other project.

data.name: Image | Picjumbo
data.description: Totally free photos for your commercial & personal works.

data.name: Image | Unsplash
data.description: Free (do whatever you want) high-resolution stock photos.

data.name: Ion rangeSlider
data.description: Cool, comfortable and easily customizable range slider.

data.name: Ion sounds
data.description: JavaScript-plugin for playing sounds on user actions and page events.

data.name: Jasny bootstrap
data.description: The missing components for your favorite front-end framework.

data.name: JQuery
data.description: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library.

data.name: JQuery backstretch
data.description: a simple jQuery plugin that allows you to add a dynamically-resized, slideshow-capable background image to any page or element.

data.name: JQuery cookie
data.description: A simple, lightweight jQuery plugin for reading, writing and deleting cookies.

data.name: JQuery easing
data.description: A jQuery plugin from GSGD to give advanced easing options.

data.name: JQuery inputmask
data.description: JQuery.inputmask is a jquery plugin which create an input mask. An inputmask helps the user with the input by ensuring a predefined format. This can be usefull for dates, numerics, phone numbers, ...

data.name: JQuery mockjax
data.description: The jQuery Mockjax Plugin provides a simple and extremely flexible interface for mocking or simulating ajax requests and responses.

data.name: JQuery mousewheel
data.description: A jQuery plugin that adds cross-browser mouse wheel support.

data.name: JQuery nicescroll
data.description: Nicescroll is a jquery plugin, for nice scrollbars with a very similar ios/mobile style.

data.name: JQuery smooth scroll
data.description: Automatically make same-page links scroll smoothly.

data.name: JQuery snippet
data.description: A plugins snippet code to clipboard.

data.name: JQuery sparklines
data.description: This jQuery plugin generates sparklines (small inline charts) directly in the browser using data supplied either inline in the HTML, or via javascript.

data.name: JQuery validation
data.description: This jQuery plugin makes simple clientside form validation easy, whilst still offering plenty of customization options.

data.name: JQuery Waypoints
data.description: Waypoints is a jQuery plugin that makes it easy to execute a function whenever you scroll to an element.

data.name: Jstimezonedetect
data.description: Automatic Timezone Detection Using JavaScript.

data.name: LESS
data.description: Less is a CSS pre-processor, meaning that it extends the CSS language, adding features that allow variables, mixins, functions and many other techniques that allow you to make CSS that is more maintainable, themable and extendable.

data.name: Map | Gmap3
data.description: Enrich your Google Maps using the jquery plugin Gmap3. Gmap3 allows you to easily understand the power of Google Maps 3, due to the simplicity of jQuery

data.name: Map | jqvmap
data.description: JQVMap is a jQuery plugin that renders Vector Maps.  It uses resizable Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) for modern browsers like Firefox, Safari, Chrome, Opera and Internet Explorer 9.  Legacy support for older versions of Internet Explorer 6-8 is provided via VML.

data.name: Map | jvectormap
data.description: jQuery plugin for embedding vector maps with reach API and methods for data visualization to the web-pages.

data.name: Masonry
data.description: Masonry is a JavaScript grid layout library. It works by placing elements in optimal position based on available vertical space, sort of like a mason fitting stones in a wall. You’ve probably seen it in use all over the Internet.

data.name: Mixitup
data.description: MixItUp is a jQuery plugin providing animated filtering and sorting.

data.name: Noty
data.description: NOTY is a jQuery plugin that makes it easy to create alert - success - error - warning - information - confirmation messages as an alternative the standard alert dialog.

data.name: Prettify
data.description: Syntax highlighting of code snippets in a web page.

data.name: Raphael
data.description: Raphaël is a small JavaScript library that should simplify your work with vector graphics on the web.

data.name: Respond
data.description: A fast & lightweight polyfill for min/max-width CSS3 Media Queries (for IE 6-8, and more).

data.name: retina.js
data.description: JavaScript, Less and Sass helpers for rendering high-resolution image variants.

data.name: Select2
data.description: Select2 gives you a customizable select box with support for searching, tagging, remote data sets, infinite scrolling, and many other highly used options.

data.name: Skycons
data.description: Skycons is a set of ten animated weather glyphs, procedurally generated by JavaScript using the HTML5 canvas tag.

data.name: slider revolution
data.description: Slider Revolution is an All-Purpose Slide Displaying Solution that allows for showing almost any kind of content.

data.name: spinkit
data.description: A collection of loading indicators animated with CSS.

data.name: Summernote
data.description: Super Simple WYSIWYG Editor on Bootstrap.

data.name: Typeahead
data.description: A flexible JavaScript library that provides a strong foundation for building robust typeaheads.

data.name: Underscore
data.description: Underscore is a JavaScript library that provides a whole mess of useful functional programming helpers without extending any built-in objects.

data.name: Viewport resizer
data.description: Viewport resizer is a browser-based tool to test any website’s responsiveness. Just save the bookmarklet, go to the page you want to test, click on your created bookmarklet and check all kinds of screen resolutions of the page.

data.name: wow
data.description: Reveal CSS animation as you scroll down a page.

data.name: Yamm 3
data.description: This isYet another megamenu for Bootstrap 3 from Twitter. Lightweight and pure CSS megamenu that uses the standard navbar markup and the fluid grid system classes from Bootstrap 3.
